scripts.build:base: pnpm prepare:base && pnpm codegen && graph build
scripts.build:optimism: pnpm prepare:optimism && pnpm codegen && graph build
scripts.build:arbitrum-one: pnpm prepare:arbitrum-one && pnpm codegen && graph build
scripts.build:optimism-sepolia: pnpm prepare:optimism-sepolia && pnpm codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:base: source .env && graph deploy flow-splitter-base --node https://api.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://api.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY
scripts.deploy:optimism: source .env && graph deploy flow-splitter-optimism --node https://api.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://api.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY
scripts.deploy:arbitrum-one: source .env && graph deploy flow-splitter-arbitrum-one --node https://api.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://api.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs --deploy-key $GRAPH_DEPLOY_KEY
